configure.name: EXTRA_DL_BAUD
configure.description: Baudrate for extra datalink if link device is UART

makefile.raw: ifneq (,$(findstring udp,$(EXTRA_DL_PORT_LOWER))) include $(CFG_SHARED)/udp.makefile $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DEXTRA_DOWNLINK_DEVICE=$(EXTRA_DL_PORT_LOWER) $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DUSE_$(EXTRA_DL_PORT_UPPER) else EXTRA_DL_BAUD ?= B57600 ap.CFLAGS += -DEXTRA_DOWNLINK_DEVICE=$(EXTRA_DL_PORT_LOWER) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_$(EXTRA_DL_PORT_UPPER) ap.CFLAGS += -D$(EXTRA_DL_PORT_UPPER)_BAUD=$(EXTRA_DL_BAUD) endif
